lexUnit.name: shirt.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a. a garment for the upper body, typically with a collar and sleeves and buttons down the front

sentence.text: There was a ripping sound as Samson 's rotten shirt tore from shoulder to waist .
Whitlock swallowed back the bile in his throat and crossed to where the gunman lay , his shirt soaked in blood .
